thread.title: Liverpool's Jurgen Klopp chasing transfer of Ousmane Dembele from former club Borussia Dortmund
thread.title_full: Liverpool's Jurgen Klopp chasing transfer of Ousmane Dembele from former club Borussia Dortmund

author: Tom Hopkinson
title: Liverpool's Jurgen Klopp chasing transfer of Ousmane Dembele from former club Borussia Dortmund
text:
Sport Liverpool's Jurgen Klopp chasing transfer of Ousmane Dembele from former club Borussia Dortmund The teenage forward has been heavily linked with a move to Barcelona but the Anfield boss is refusing to give up hope Share Dembele has helped Dortmund into the last eight of this season's Champions League (Photo: Reuters) Share Get Liverpool FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp is trying to land Borussia Dortmund’s Ousmane Dembele this summer. 
The 19-year-old has been heavily linked with a move to Barcelona, but former Dortmund coach Klopp is refusing to give up hope of luring the striker to his Reds . 
He wants to bring in at least two young summer signings whose development he can continue, and will try to beat Barca and Dembele’s other suitors to the punch. Klopp has high hopes of raiding former club Dortmund for forward Dembele (Photo: Liverpool FC/Getty) Read More 
The France international joined Dortmund in the summer from Rennes in his homeland. 
Championship strugglers Nottingham Forest 17-year-old forward Ben Brereton is also on Klopp’s radar. Like us on Facebook
